actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of $2 bills bearing the portrait of Susan B. Anthony.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the issuance of two-dollar bills bearing the portrait of Susan B. Anthony in an appropriate form and design.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of $2 bills bearing the portrait of Susan B. Anthony.
